SELECT aa.* FROM( SELECT a.mmSeq ,a.mmName ,a.mmGender ,a.mmId ,a.mmEmail ,a.mmPw ,a.mmBirth ,a.mmPhone ,a.mmDateTimeReg ,a.mmDateTimeEdit ,a.mmUseNy ,a.mmDelNy ,a.mmZipNum ,a.mmAdr ,a.mmAdrDt
ORDER BY a.mmSeq desc ) aa limit #{rowNumToShow} offset #{startRnumForMysql}

SELECT a.mmSeq ,a.mmName ,a.mmGender ,a.mmId ,a.mmEmail ,a.mmPw ,a.mmBirth ,a.mmPhone ,a.mmDateTimeReg ,a.mmDateTimeEdit ,a.mmUseNy ,a.mmDelNy ,a.mmZipNum ,a.mmAdr ,a.mmAdrDt FROM member AS a WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.mmSeq = #{mmSeq}
